definition: uppercase, the upper part of a column that supports the entablature
details:
adjective
- uppercase
= example: uppercase
= synonyms: great
- of primary importance
= example: of primary importance
= synonyms: basal
- first-rate
= example: first-rate
noun
- the upper part of a column that supports the entablature
= synonyms: cap, chapiter
- one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis
= example: one of the large alphabetic characters used as the first letter in writing or printing proper names and sometimes for emphasis
= synonyms: uppercase
- a seat of government
- a center that is associated more than any other with some activity or product
= example: a center that is associated more than any other with some activity or product
- wealth in the form of money or property owned by a person or business and human resources of economic value
- assets available for use in the production of further assets
= synonyms: working capital
